modName: Fudou Myouou Katana and Tachi with Blood
summary: Get your shiny blades all nice and bloody.
descriptionHtml:
Because I wanted the Fudou Myouou Katana and Tachi to replace certain weapons in my game, I wanted to add blood meshes to them. So I managed to with a heaping amount of web browsing and trial and error on my noobish part. And I blurted it out on the forums... and then people started asking for them. So here they are, with YYK's permission, of course. Now you can get these beautifully shiny blades all nice and bloody... if that's what you're into.

Requirements: Install the original [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53872/?]Fudou Myouou Katana and Tachi[/url] before installing these new meshes.

BTW, I just gotta say it, YYK... the work on these blades are BEYOND OUTSTANDING. You and your team are ARTISTS!!!

Enjoy.
author: CHINA-YYK and Moral Cat and CaptainRC
